original_title: Ceylon Chamber of Commerce 184th AGM on Friday
original_body_lines: The Ceylon Chamber of Commerce will hold its 184th Annual General Meeting (AGM) on 30 June at 6 p.m. at the Cinnamon Grand Hotel, Colombo.

Japanese Ambassador to Sri Lanka Hideaki Mizukoshi will be the Chief Guest at the AGM, underscoring the deep-rooted economic ties and warm relations between Japan and Sri Lanka. As the leading business Chamber in Sri Lanka representing a diverse range of industries and sectors, The Ceylon Chamber of Commerce AGM will bring together esteemed members of the business community, serving as a platform for driving meaningful discussions, fostering collaboration, and facilitating strategic networking opportunities. With a firm focus on innovation, resilience, and cooperation, the AGM will reinforce the Ceylon Chamber’s continual efforts in the arena of business facilitation leading towards sustainable economic growth.
